original_text: And your house and your kingdom shall be made sure forever before me. Your throne shall be established forever.’”
korean_text: 네 집과 네 나라가 내 앞에서 영원히 보전되고 네 왕위가 영원히 견고하리라 하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: And your house and your kingdom shall be made sure
sentences.korean_translation: 네 집과 네 나라는 견고히 세워지리라

sentences.original_text: Your throne shall be established forever
